mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE id=#{id} and status !=0
select distinct o.id as oid, de.mname, de.price as mprice, d.oname, d.oprice from orders o join detail de on o.id = de.odid join dopt d on de.id=d.did where o.id=#{oid}
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET uid=#{uid}, sid=#{sid}, addr=#{addr}, addrd=#{addrd}, phon=#{phon}, nick=#{nick}, ask=#{ask} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE orders SET status=0 WHERE id=#{id}
